thread.title: US sues to block Electrolux buy of GE appliance business
thread.title_full: US sues to block Electrolux buy of GE appliance business

title: US sues to block Electrolux buy of GE appliance business
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Jul 1, 2015, 20:12 BST - UK Markets closed US sues to block Electrolux buy of GE appliance business AFP – 11 minutes ago View Photo 

US antitrust officials filed suit on Wednesday to block the sale of General Electric's appliance business to Sweden's Electrolux (Stockholm: ELUX-A.ST - news ) , saying the $3.3 billion deal would harm consumers. 
The sale would limit competition and lead to higher prices for US consumers of ranges, cooktops and wall ovens, said the Justice Department, which filed a civil antitrust lawsuit in a US court in Washington.
